game.deck: An action RPG for PlayStation platforms set in a world where no-one sleeps.
game.description:
Overview

Yoru no Nai Kuni is an action RPG developed by GUST for PlayStation platforms.
game.name: Nights of Azure

game.deck: The thirteenth entry in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms franchise.
game.description:
Overview

Sangokushi 13 is a historical war simulation developed by Koei Tecmo.
game.name: Sangokushi 13

game.deck: Konami's long-running soccer franchise returns for a 2015 release, taking more advantage of the Fox Engine, among many other improvements.
game.description:
PES 2016 is the 15th entry in the series developed by PES productions and published by Konami. While FIFA has been deemed the superior football game during the Xbox 360 and PS3 generation, PES 2016 aimed to reinvoke the quality the series had during the PS2 era (PES 5 and PES 6) and make up for the lack of licensing.

New Features

Konami's Fox engine was first implemented in PES 2014, but really started to pay off in 2016 where a new collision system allowed for a more physical game and improved visuals. Further improvements are the implementation of Dynamic Weather, new camera angle and improved keeper AI.

Game modes

The old time fan favorite Master League puts you in the shoes of a football manager over a multiple season long career. Improvements for 2016 are: an improved scouting system, menu layout and player roles. For instance: Experienced players can obtain the Leadership role which increases players stats in important matches.

MyClub was introduced in the previous iteration and improvements have been made on the game mode since. In this mode the player is aiming to improve their team by obtaining better players. Scouts can be bought with GP, the ingame currency, which is earned by playing matches or by spending money on MyClub coins.

  • Become a legend: Play through a created or real life player's career
  • Online Division: Ladder style online pvp
game.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2016

game.deck: An update to last year's NASCAR '14 with 2015 drivers and tracks by new developer DMi Games.
game.description:
• All 2015 Drivers & Cars
  • All 2015 Tracks
  • Improved online reliability
game.name: NASCAR '15

game.deck: Bigben continues its series of handball games, this time with new developer Eko Software.
game.description:
Overview

Handball 16 is a handball sports simulation developed by EKO Software. Dropping the official International Handball Federation license of Bigben's previous handball games, it instead offers teams and players from national leagues like the French LNH and German DKB.
game.name: Handball 16

game.deck: Samurai Warriors' first expansion pack release uses Samurai Warriors 4-II as a base and adds many more features, including an option for characters to wed.
game.description:
Overview

Samurai Warriors 4: Empires is an alternate version of Samurai Warriors 4-II that replaces the story mode with a turn-based strategy meta-game.
game.name: Sengoku Musou 4 Empires

game.deck: The next game in the Skylanders franchises adds air, sea, and land vehicles to the mix.
game.description:
Overview

Skylanders SuperChargers is an action-adventure game developed by Vicarious Visions and Beenox Studios and was published by Activision for multiple platforms.

The Nintendo Wii and 3DS versions of the game are titled Skylanders SuperChargers Racing. These versions of the game are only the racing portions and feature none of the adventure elements.

Nintendo versions

The Wii, Wii U, and 3DS versions of Skylanders SuperChargers have two guest Nintendo characters exclusive to these platforms: Donkey Kong and Bowser. The figures for these two characters can be used as Amiibo with the twist of a dial.
game.name: Skylanders SuperChargers

game.deck: The seventeenth installment in 2K's basketball franchise features a career mode written and directed by Spike Lee.
game.description:
Cover Athletes

This season 2K has selected Stephen Curry, James Harden, and Anthony Davis. With each copy of NBA 2K16, three separate covers will be included with each version so people will have the option of choosing which cover to show.

MyCareer Mode

The 2015 MyCareer (story) mode is directed by Spike Lee.

Special Edition

2K announced a 'Michael Jordan Special Edition' of NBA 2K16, which includes:

  • Michael Jordan NBA 2K16 Poster
  • Michael Jordan Wall Cling
  • Digital Jordan shoes for your MyPLAYER
  • Jordan T-shirt for your MyPLAYER
  • Jordan Jersey for your MyPLAYER
  • 30,000 Virtual Currency
  • MyTEAM VIP+
  • 3 Emerald Packs AND a new Special Edition Exclusive Moments Card

This edition will also be available on the 25th September 2015, 4 days before the release of the regular edition.
game.name: NBA 2K16

game.deck: An upcoming entry in the long-running Tales action-RPG series, following the exploits of a pirate named Velvet.
game.name: Tales of Berseria

game.deck: The 2015 edition of the offical Tour de France video game franchise.
game.name: Le Tour de France 2015

game.deck: Barbie and Her Sisters Rescue Puppies.
game.name: Barbie & Her Sisters: Puppy Rescue

game.deck: Based on the classic 80s version of the Transformers animated series, Transformers: Devastation by PlatinumGames is a brawler with an authentic retro-themed art style.
game.description:
Overview:

A character action game based around the first generation of Transformers. You play as one of a handful of Autobots in hopes of stopping Megatron and his Decepticons from taking over Earth. The gameplay is similar to other Platinum Games developed games focusing on light and heavy combos and parrying enemy attacks to give you the advantage.
game.name: Transformers: Devastation

game.deck: An entry in the Just Dance series which introduces smartphone interaction and Just Dance Unlimited, a streaming service.
game.name: Just Dance 2016

game.aliases: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book
game.deck: The seventeenth entry in the Atelier series of RPGs by Gust.
game.name: Sophie no Atelier: Fushigi na Hon no Renkinjutsushi

game.deck: A second 2D fighting game in the Koihime Musou series.
game.name: Koihime Enbu

game.deck: The 2015 edition of 2K and Yuke's WWE 2K franchise.
game.description:
Overview

WWE 2K16 is a professional wrestling game developed by Yuke's Co. and published by 2K Sports for PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, and Xbox One.
game.name: WWE 2K16

game.deck: A spin-off from the long-running JRPG series, Builders tasks the player with rebuilding the ruined world of Alfegard... using some very familiar looking square blocks.
game.description:
Overview

Dragon Quest Builders is a spin-off from the long-running fantasy JRPG franchise Dragon Quest. In a significant departure from the usual games in the franchise, the game world is composed of large square blocks, very reminiscent of Minecraft.

Plot

The game takes place in Alfegard - the world of the original NES Dragon Quest/Dragon Warrior. In an alternate ending to the original game, when the hero is faced with a choice, he chooses to share rule with the Dragonlord instead of defeating him. With the land around them in ruin, the player is tasked with rebuilding and restoring it to its former splendor.
game.name: Dragon Quest Builders

game.deck: An HD remake of the PS2 game Odin Sphere, with reworked gameplay and additional content.
game.description:
Overview

Odin Sphere Leifthrasir is a fantasy action RPG developed by Vanillaware Ltd. for PlayStation platforms.
game.name: Odin Sphere Leifthrasir

game.aliases: WRC 5 FIA World Rally Championship WRC FIA World Rally Championship 5

Overview

WRC 5 is a rally cross racing game developed by Kylotonn Entertainment.

game.deck: BigBen and HB Studios adds the official Rugby World Cup license to their 2015 Rugby game.
game.description:
Overview

Rugby World Cup 2015 is a rugby union game developed by HB Studios.

game.deck: The first revision in the Guilty Gear Xrd series.
game.description:
Overview

Revelator continues off of Guilty Gear Xrd -SIGN- with new characters and adjustments to previous characters and mechanics. All characters from SIGN return in Revelator.

New Characters

  • Dizzy (Returning)
  • Johnny (Returning)
  • Jack-O'
  • Jam (Returning)
  • Kum Haehyun
game.name: Guilty Gear Xrd -Revelator-

game.name: Attack on Titan (Working Title)

game.deck: An HD remake of the original Ryu ga Gotoku (Yakuza) game, for PlayStation 4.
game.name: Ryu ga Gotoku Kiwami
Monster High: New Ghoul in School

game.deck: The 2016 edition of the Powerful Pro Yakyuu series.
game.name: New Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu

game.deck: Jackbox Games returns with five more comedic party games.
game.description:
Games

Quiplash XL

Contains all of the prompts from the original game, the Quip Pack 1 DLC, and brand new prompts.

Fibbage 2

More questions and new features like getting to choose own sound effect and having audience participation.

Bomb Corp

Players and their friends are interns at the titular Bomb Corp where players will have to work together to do regular intern tasks and also stop bombs from blowing up.

Earwax

Players have to choose sound effects that best describe a phrase.

Bidiots

Similar to Drawful, but instead, players draw a picture and bid on other players' friends pictures. Whoever gets the most profit from these pictures wins.
game.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 2

game.deck: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition adds additional characters, balance changes, and more.
game.name: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition

game.deck: Koei Tecmo's mythical Japan flavored demon hunting game gets its first fully fledged sequel.
game.description:
Overview

Toukiden 2 is a demon hunting game developed by Omega Force for PlayStation platforms. It is a sequel to Toukiden: The Age of Demons/Toukiden Kiwami. It has been indicated that the game will feature a more continuous open world than the first game in the series.
game.name: Toukiden 2
